_header: Farewell my heart farewell both friend and foe
_description: A love letter with anaphoric lines — four stanzas rhyme royal

Banna.First Lines:
ffair weill my Hairt fair weill bayth freind and foffair weill
                    þe weill of sweitast madicyne…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Thairfoir as now this litill remembranceȜe tak and keip
                    in to ȝour gouernanc
